name: Beathouse (2016)
description:
Do you love fast-paced, high-stakes storytelling? Do you dream of life as an 80s metal maven, a cursed warrior princess, or a janitor in space? Do you need more reasons to yell at your friends? 

Beathouse is a handmade, local and organic tabletop roleplaying game. It's easy to learn, a snap to play, and thanks to its exclusive reroll, backlash and overshoot mechanics, every game is an absolute madhouse. 

Ringing in at a beefy 61 pages, this manual includes a basic overview of Beathouse gameplay, content from dozens of campaigns, blank character sheets, campaign concepts, and a full sample campaign! Never played a tabletop RPG before? No worries! This manual was made for you!

So come on! Get hype for Beathouse, the tabletop RPG where the HITS KEEP COMING!

(Originally published in 2016)
